Package models

Class PortfolioModelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.PortfolioModelImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PortfolioModel
    public class PortfolioModelImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PortfolioModel
    Represents a class that manages all the functionalities of a stock portfolio application for different users using an XML file storage.
